page.title: 10EDUCATION
page.content: Young children under five could go to the Methodist Church play school or the Nursery here,or if they wanted to they could stay at home.Then the five to elevens go to Marford School or they could go to Gresford School. Marford School is about 15 years old and has about 250 pupils.There are 8 classes (not including the Nursery)and 8 teachers. Most of the 11-16 year olds go to Darland,but some go to private schools such as the Kings or Queens schools. Darland is in Rossett and over 1000 pupils go there.When they leave Darland (16-18)they go to Yale VIth Form College that is in Wrexham(about four miles away).
